fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Welcome {{ content_object.first_name }}!

Congratulations on your new Repower at Home account. You’ve taken your first step on the path towards a smarter home and a cleaner world.

At Repower at Home, cool cats like you are getting together to save energy, save money, and save the world.

Can’t wait to get started? Click here to log in.

With so much to do, where should you begin? Here are some bright ideas:

  • Jump in and complete this month’s featured action.
  • Get plugged in to your local energy efficiency scene by finding a community to join.
  • Are you the first to arrive at the party? Start a community for your neighborhood, school, church, or knitting club. Then, organize your community to take action together.
  • Spread the word! Tweet it out, share on Facebook, send some smoke signals, whatever. Let everyone know about all the good you’re doing, and how they can join in on the fun.

As you cruise around the site, let us know what you think by dropping us a line at feedback@repowerathome.com.

If you are interested in starting a community or hosting an energy meeting or just want to learn more contact Brian Ward at brian.ward@climateprotect.org or call (202) 567-6800.

Out next Repower at Home Introduction call will be on September 15th at 9:00pm EST. On this call you will learn more about Repower at Home and how you can be part of the movement. Click here to RSVP.

Welcome home,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Registration
fields.subject: Welcome to Repower at Home

fields.name: New Account
fields.subject: New RAH User: {{ content_object.email }}
